term.title: stochastic theories

item.text: Theories that treat reaction rates in terms of the probabilities of transitions between the various energy levels in the reactant molecules.

sources.item: PAC, 1981, 53, 753. 'Symbolism and Terminology in Chemical Kinetics' on page 767 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198153030753)

term.citation: Citation: 'stochastic theories' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.S06018
